subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Sherri Steinhauer shot a five-under-par 67 and held off a late charge by Christina Kim for a one-stroke victory at the L.P.G.A. State Farm Classic in Springfield, Ill. The 44-year-old Steinhauer, who led after every round, finished at 17-under 271 for the four-day tournament. The title is her eighth in her 22 years on the Tour.
